about_the_game:
This is a demo version of the game, in which the first chapter of the game awaits you.


Westild's Law offers dynamic shootouts where you must cleverly use every element of your arsenal to achieve victory. Throw dynamite to clear your path or send enemies flying, use cunning when ammo runs low by throwing your weapon at enemies to stun them and take their weapons. And when the situation gets critical, activate "ultra-sense," slowing time and enhancing your abilities to showcase the true power of the hero.



Embark on adventures through 48 levels, each offering unique challenges such as shootouts with bandits, rescuing hostages, horse races, defending dynamite wagons, saving trains, and epic boss battles with Wild Joe's gang!



Prepare for epic battles where every step and every shot writes history in Westild's Law. Become a Wild West legend, restore peace and order in your town, and show everyone that the law is more than just a word. Are you ready to take on the challenge?



Features:
  • Exciting Missions: Dynamic shootouts, horse races, rescuing trains and hostages, defending dynamite wagons, and boss fights!
  • Character Development: Upgrade your heroes using trophies and money earned in battles to buy new skills and weapons.
  • Weapons: From simple revolvers to powerful rifles and machine guns – choose the weapons that suit your playstyle, and when ammo runs out, use your weapon as a projectile to stun enemies.
  • Musical Accompaniment: Enjoy music that creates a unique Wild West atmosphere.
